CONDITIONAL_ORDERS_REVAMP.TITLE: Refreshed conditional order experience!
CONDITIONAL_ORDERS_REVAMP.BODY: Conditional orders on dYdX Chain have been completely revamped! Now more reliable, intuitive, and performant than ever. Check out more details {TWITTER_LINK}.

DELEVERAGED.TITLE: Position Deleveraged
DELEVERAGED.BODY: Your {SIDE} position on {MARKET} has been deleveraged.

DISCOVERY_PROGRAM.TITLE: Earn up to $200 in 30 Minutes!
DISCOVERY_PROGRAM.BODY: Make your trading journey the best it can be by participating in a user interview and sharing feedback. Spots are limited so click {HERE_LINK} to sign up or learn more!

FINAL_SETTLEMENT.TITLE: Position Settled
FINAL_SETTLEMENT.BODY: {MARKET} has closed. Your {SIDE} position on {MARKET} has reached final settlement.

FOK_DEPRECATION.TITLE: FOK orders deprecated
FOK_DEPRECATION.BODY: Fill-or-Kill (FOK) orders have been deprecated. All other order types continue to be available.

INCENTIVES_SEASON_BEGUN.TITLE: Season {SEASON_NUMBER} has begun!
INCENTIVES_SEASON_BEGUN.BODY: In season {PREV_SEASON_NUMBER}, median rewards earned were {DYDX_AMOUNT} DYDX (~{USDC_AMOUNT} USDC)!

INCENTIVES_SEASON_ENDED.TITLE: Season {SEASON_NUMBER} has ended!
INCENTIVES_SEASON_ENDED.BODY: Thanks for participating in the launch incentives program. Stay tuned for updates on future reward programs!

ISOLATED_MARGIN_LIVE.TITLE: Isolated Margin is live
ISOLATED_MARGIN_LIVE.BODY: Isolated Margin is now live! To learn more, head {LEARN_MORE}.

REWARDS_DISTRIBUTED.TITLE: Season {SEASON_NUMBER} launch rewards have been distributed!

OFFSETTING.TITLE: Position Offsetting
OFFSETTING.BODY: Your {SIDE} position on {MARKET} was used to offset a deleveraged position.

ORDER_FILL.TITLE: Order Filled
ORDER_FILL.BODY: Your order to {SIDE} {AMOUNT} {MARKET} has been filled at ${AVERAGE_PRICE}.

ORDER_PARTIAL_FILL.TITLE: Order Partially Filled
ORDER_PARTIAL_FILL.BODY: {FILLED_AMOUNT} {MARKET} of your order to {SIDE} {AMOUNT} {MARKET} has been filled.

ORDER_TRIGGERED.TITLE: Order Triggered
ORDER_TRIGGERED.BODY: Your order to {SIDE} {AMOUNT} {MARKET} has been triggered.

ORDER_CANCEL.TITLE: Order Canceled
ORDER_CANCEL.BODY: Your order to {SIDE} {AMOUNT} {MARKET} has been canceled.

ORDER_CANCEL_WITH_PARTIAL_FILL.TITLE: Order Canceled with Partial Fill
ORDER_CANCEL_WITH_PARTIAL_FILL.BODY: Your order to {SIDE} {AMOUNT} {MARKET} has been canceled with {TOTAL_FILLED} partially filled.

LIQUIDATION.TITLE: Position Liquidated
LIQUIDATION.BODY: Your {SIDE} position on {MARKET} has been liquidated.

POSITION_CLOSED.TITLE: Position Closed
POSITION_CLOSED.BODY: Your position on {MARKET} has been closed.

DEPOSIT_SUCCESS.TITLE: Deposit Succeeded
DEPOSIT_SUCCESS.BODY: Your deposit of {AMOUNT} {ASSET} has been confirmed.

FAST_WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.TITLE: Fast Withdrawal Succeeded
FAST_WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.BODY: Your fast withdrawal of {AMOUNT} {ASSET} has been confirmed.

LIQUIDITY_TIER_UPDATE_SOL_USD.TITLE: Trade SOL-USD with 20x Leverage
LIQUIDITY_TIER_UPDATE_SOL_USD.BODY: SOL-USD and all Isolated Markets are now available to trade with up to 20x leverage.

RELEASE_REWARDS_AND_FULL_TRADING.TITLE: Rewards and trading are live on dYdX Chain!
RELEASE_REWARDS_AND_FULL_TRADING.BODY: Full trading is live on dYdX Chain! This includes staking rewards, trading rewards, and the 6-month launch incentives program by Chaos Labs. Learn more {DOS_BLOGPOST} and {TRADING_BLOGPOST} (third-party link).

SLOW_WITHDRAWAL_PENDING.TITLE: Slow Withdrawal Pending
SLOW_WITHDRAWAL_PENDING.BODY: Your withdrawal of {AMOUNT} {ASSET} will be ready in 12 hours.

SLOW_WITHDRAWAL_SUCCESS.TITLE: Slow Withdrawal Succeeded
SLOW_WITHDRAWAL_SUCCESS.BODY: Your withdrawal of {AMOUNT} {ASSET} has been confirmed.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATING.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATING.BODY: Your stop loss trigger is being created at {NEW_VALUE}.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATING_ERROR.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATING_ERROR.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {NEW_VALUE} could not be created.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATED.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_CREATED.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {NEW_VALUE} has been created.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATING.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATING.BODY: Your take profit trigger is being created at {NEW_VALUE}.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATING_ERROR.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATING_ERROR.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {NEW_VALUE} could not be created.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATED.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_CREATED.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {NEW_VALUE} has been created.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATING.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATING.BODY: Your stop loss trigger is being updated to {NEW_VALUE}.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATING_ERROR.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATING_ERROR.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {OLD_VALUE} could not be replaced.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATED.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_UPDATED.BODY: Your stop loss trigger will now trigger at {NEW_VALUE}.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATING.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATING.BODY: Your take profit trigger is being updated to {NEW_VALUE}.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATING_ERROR.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATING_ERROR.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {OLD_VALUE} could not be replaced.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATED.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_UPDATED.BODY: Your take profit trigger will now trigger at {NEW_VALUE}.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVING.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVING.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {OLD_VALUE} is being removed.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVING_ERROR.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVING_ERROR.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {OLD_VALUE} could not be cancelled.

STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVED.TITLE: Stop Loss
STOP_LOSS_TRIGGER_REMOVED.BODY: Your stop loss trigger at {OLD_VALUE} has been removed.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVING.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVING.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {OLD_VALUE} is being removed.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVING_ERROR.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVING_ERROR.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {OLD_VALUE} could not be cancelled.

TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVED.TITLE: Take Profit
TAKE_PROFIT_TRIGGER_REMOVED.BODY: Your take profit trigger at {OLD_VALUE} has been removed.

TOP_100_WALLET_ADDRESSES.TITLE: Want more support?
TOP_100_WALLET_ADDRESSES.BODY: Thank you for being a large trader on dYdX! The team would like to offer you a higher level of personalized support and the opportunity to connect directly with them.

TWITTER_DYDX_200B_GIVEAWAY.TITLE: $20K giveaway
TWITTER_DYDX_200B_GIVEAWAY.BODY: To celebrate surpassing 200B in cumulative trading volume, dYdX is running a Twitter giveaway, where you have the opportunity to claim $200. 100 winners will be selected based on a random selection mechanism after August 16, 2024, 23:59 UTC {HERE_LINK}.

MARKET_WIND_DOWN.TITLE: {MARKET} market wound down
MARKET_WIND_DOWN.BODY: On {DATE}, the {MARKET} market went through final settlement. Existing positions have been closed and open orders have now been canceled. You can find more information regarding the final settlement {HERE_LINK}.

MARKET_WIND_DOWN_PROPOSAL.TITLE: Live proposal to wind down {MARKET} market
MARKET_WIND_DOWN_PROPOSAL.BODY: There is currently a live proposal to wind down the {MARKET} market. If passed, the {MARKET} market will enter final settlement on {DATE}. Existing positions will be closed and open orders will be canceled. You can find more information regarding the proposal {HERE_LINK}.

TWO_MARKET_WIND_DOWN.TITLE: {MARKET_1} and {MARKET_2} markets wound down
TWO_MARKET_WIND_DOWN.BODY: On {DATE}, the {MARKET_1} and {MARKET_2} markets went through final settlement. Existing positions have been closed and open orders have now been canceled. You can find more information regarding the final settlement {HERE_LINK}.

TWO_MARKET_WIND_DOWN_PROPOSAL.TITLE: Live proposal to wind down {MARKET_1} and {MARKET_2} markets
TWO_MARKET_WIND_DOWN_PROPOSAL.BODY: There is currently a live proposal to wind down the {MARKET_1} and {MARKET_2} markets. If passed, the {MARKET_1} and {MARKET_2} markets will enter final settlement on {DATE}. Existing positions will be closed and open orders will be canceled. You can find more information regarding the proposal {HERE_LINK}.

MARKET_PARAM_UPDATE.TITLE: Live proposal to update {MARKET} parameters
MARKET_PARAM_UPDATE.BODY: There is currently a live proposal to update the parameters of {MARKET} market. If passed, the {MARKET} market will have Coinbase Pro {MARKET} as the only oracle source. You can find more information regarding the proposal {HERE_LINK}.

TRUMPWIN_MARKET_LAUNCH.TITLE: Trade the U.S. presidential election!
TRUMPWIN_MARKET_LAUNCH.BODY: {MARKET} is now live. This market will settle at $1 if Donald J. Trump wins the 2024 election. Otherwise, it will settle at $0.001.

KEPLR_SUPPORT.TITLE: dYdX now supports Keplr!
KEPLR_SUPPORT.BODY: You can now connect and use dYdX with your Keplr wallet! Try it now.

PHANTOM_SUPPORT.TITLE: dYdX now supports Phantom!
PHANTOM_SUPPORT.BODY: You can now connect and use dYdX with your Phantom wallet! Try it now.
